channel.title: Showing the other player infomation
channel.description: so i made an interface where you right Click and it shows the player infomtion but the question is how do i make the infomtion come up like the name of the player and that levles [img]http://i1121.photobucket.com/albums/l505/killboy11/Pic.png[/img]

item.title: Showing the other player infomation
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

TheTutMan:

so i made an interface where you right lick and it shows the player infomtion but the question is how do i make the infomtion come up like the name of the player and that levles

Lol right lick…
You need some sort of method to get the other player… Look into your ::ban ::mute ::ipban etc. commands, I’d be more hope, but I’m stuck in school right now, sorry.
Fricken Fridder beating me to it…

Read full topic

item.title: Showing the other player infomation
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

				for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
					Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i];
					String otherPlayer = c2.toString();
					if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
						if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(otherPlayer)) {
							c.getPA().sendFrame126(c2.absX, line);
						}
					}
				}

Just an example and I’m not sure if it will work or not. Add it to whatever handles the clicking option.

Read full topic
